meanings.definition: The activity or skill of making objects from wood.
meanings.sent1: She learned woodcrafts from her grandfather in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The artisan displayed his beautiful woodcrafts at the local fair.
meanings.sent3: The woodcrafts class turned into a friendly competition to see who could make the tallest tower.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to woodcrafts was as solid as the oak he carved.
meanings.sent5: The intricate woodcrafts created by the artist left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The cabin was filled with various woodcrafts, from tables to figurines.
meanings.sent2: The antique store specialized in selling unique woodcrafts from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the delicate woodcrafts, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were adorned with woodcrafts that seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with a collection of woodcrafts that added warmth to the space.
